00039             enum ModelParamFlag
00040             {
00041                         FLAG_NONE = 0,                                                                                                          
00042                         FLAG_RED = 1 << PARAM_RED,                                                                      
00043                         FLAG_GREEN = 1 << PARAM_GREEN,                                                      
00044                         FLAG_BLUE = 1 << PARAM_BLUE,                                                        
00045                         FLAG_ALPHA = 1 << PARAM_ALPHA,                                                      
00046                         FLAG_SIZE = 1 << PARAM_SIZE,                                                        
00047                         FLAG_MASS = 1 << PARAM_MASS,                                                        
00048                         FLAG_ANGLE = 1 << PARAM_ANGLE,                                                      
00049                         FLAG_TEXTURE_INDEX = 1 << PARAM_TEXTURE_INDEX,  
00050                         FLAG_CUSTOM_0 = 1 << PARAM_CUSTOM_0,                                    
00051                         FLAG_CUSTOM_1 = 1 << PARAM_CUSTOM_1,                                    
00052                         FLAG_CUSTOM_2 = 1 << PARAM_CUSTOM_2,                                    
00053             };

00093             class SPK_PREFIX Model : public Registerable
00094             {

00417             private :
00418 
00419                         // total number of parameters
00420                         static const size_t NB_PARAMS = 11;
00421                         // default values for the parameters
00422                         static const float DEFAULT_VALUES[NB_PARAMS];
00423 
00424                         // arrays storing the values of parameters for the model following that form :
00425                         // enable : 1 value -> value
00426                         // mutable : 2 values -> start value | end value 
00427                         // random : 2 values -> min value | max value
00428                         // mutable and random : 4 values -> start min value | start max value | end min value | end max value
00429                         // interpolated : 0 value
00430                         float* params;
00431                         size_t paramsSize;
00432 
00433                         // array storing the parameters that are enabled
00434                         size_t nbEnableParams;
00435                         int* enableParams;
00436 
00437                         // array storing the parameters that are mutable
00438                         size_t nbMutableParams;
00439                         int* mutableParams;
00440 
00441                         // array storing the parameters that are interpolated
00442                         size_t nbInterpolatedParams;
00443                         int* interpolatedParams;
00444 
00445                         // nb of random parameters
00446                         size_t nbRandomParams;
00447 
00448                         // array of interpolators
00449                         Interpolator* interpolators[NB_PARAMS]; 
00450 
00451                         // the flags of the model
00452                         int enableFlag;
00453                         int mutableFlag;
00454                         int randomFlag;
00455                         int interpolatedFlag;
00456 
00457                         int particleEnableIndices[NB_PARAMS]; // array storing the index of a parameter in the enableParams array
00458                         int particleMutableIndices[NB_PARAMS]; // array storing the index of a parameter in the mutableParams array
00459                         int indices[NB_PARAMS]; // array storing the index of a parameter in the model param array
00460 
00461                         float lifeTimeMin;
00462                         float lifeTimeMax;
00463                         bool immortal;
00464 
00465                         void initParamArrays(const Model& model);
00466             };

00479             inline Model* Model::create(int enableFlag,int mutableFlag,int randomFlag,int interpolatedFlag)
00480             {
00481                         Model* obj = new Model(enableFlag,mutableFlag,randomFlag,interpolatedFlag);
00482                         registerObject(obj);
00483                         return obj;
00484             }

00512             inline int Model::isEnabled(ModelParam type) const
00513             {
00514                         return enableFlag & (1 << type);
00515             }
00516 
00517             inline int Model::isMutable(ModelParam type) const
00518             {
00519                         return mutableFlag & (1 << type);
00520             }
00521 
00522             inline int Model::isRandom(ModelParam type) const
00523             {
00524                         return randomFlag & (1 << type);
00525             }
00526 
00527             inline int Model::isInterpolated(ModelParam type) const
00528             {
00529                         return interpolatedFlag & (1 << type);
00530             }

00548             {

00552             inline size_t Model::getNbInterpolated() const
00553             {
00554                         return nbInterpolatedParams;

00556 
00557             inline size_t Model::getSizeOfParticleCurrentArray() const
00558             {
00559                         return nbEnableParams;
00560             }
00561 
00562             inline size_t Model::getSizeOfParticleExtendedArray() const
00563             {
00564                         return nbMutableParams + (nbInterpolatedParams << 1) + nbInterpolatedParams; // nbMutable + nbInterpolated * 3
00565             }
00566 
00567             inline size_t Model::getSizeOfModelArray() const
00568             {
00569                         return paramsSize;
00570             }
00571 
00572             inline size_t Model::getParameterOffset(ModelParam param) const
00573             {
00574                         return particleEnableIndices[param];
00575             }
